employees.title: Our employees
employees.desc: My Ticket employs specialists in the field of consulting and information technology, who have certificates from the world's leading software and hardware manufacturers. The professional development of employees, the active development of new technologies and advanced world experience occur due to the permanent training and advanced training programs for personnel in My Ticket.
